sentences.en: As the world becomes more complex, some things do, of course, standardize and globalize.
sentences.cn: 随着世界变得日益复杂，某些事物确实理所当然地规范化和全球化了。

sentences.en: Attempts to standardize English spelling have never been successful.
sentences.cn: 统一英语拼写的尝试从未成功过。

sentences.en: Conclusion: It must be necessary to standardize the application of antibacterial drugs.
sentences.cn: 结论: 必须规范抗菌药物的应用.

sentences.en: Efforts to standardize English spellings have not been completely successful.
sentences.cn: 将英语拼写标准化的努力并不完全成功.

sentences.en: Fourth , we will work to rectify and standardize the real estate market.
sentences.cn: 是大力整顿和规范房地产市场秩序.

sentences.en: OBJECTIVE : To further standardize oral prescription drug labels in hospital pharmacy.
sentences.cn: 目的: 进一步规范医院药房的口服处方药标签.

sentences.en: Objective To standardize planting technique and improve quality of Radix Angelicae Sinensis.
sentences.cn: 目的规范当归种植技术、提高当归质量.

sentences.en: OBJECTIVE To standardize the management and safety usage of disposable medical articles.
sentences.cn: 目的为了规范化管理和安全使用一次性医疗用品.

sentences.en: Objective To standardize the warning languages and the patterns in admonitory plates.
sentences.cn: 目的使警示标识牌的图案及警示语句达到规范化.

sentences.en: She nationality changed it in some way to make It'standardize.
sentences.cn: 随着客家先民的南迁,这一命名方式被传播到了闽粤赣边的畲族地区.

sentences.en: Standardize and limit the number of drug concentrations available in the organization.
sentences.cn: 限制医院内药物浓缩液的备用量并标准化.

sentences.en: Standardize and limit the number of drug concentrations used by the organization.
sentences.cn: 限定医院内同一药品不同浓度之品项数并订定规范.

sentences.en: To prepare the BOM together with mechanical engineer to standardize the production.
sentences.cn: 与机械工程师配合编制相应产品应编列材料BOM供生产统一规范.

sentences.en: To strengthen the financial management and standardize the account the GL.
sentences.cn: 统一区域整体财务核算的规范性、法性,加强对分公司的财务管理.

sentences.en: To strengthen the financial management and standardize the account through the GL.
sentences.cn: 统一区域整体财务核算的规范性、合法性,加强对分公司的财务管理.

sentences.en: We will extend and standardize legal services and provide effective legal aid.
sentences.cn: 拓展和规范法律服务,积极开展法律援助.

标准化；[数] 规格化；校准

trans.tran_en: to make all the things of one particular type the same as each other
